title: PREVENT FLAT TIRES IN TRACTORS TRAILERS & TRUCKS! CRAZY!

tasks.task: Install Multi-Seal tire repair and preventative sealant.
subtasks: Dissect the process of using Multi-Seal for repairing and preventing tire leaks.
Explain the application of Multi-Seal in various vehicles such as tractors, trailers, ATVs, and other off-road equipment.
Describe the different products and their usage: Flat-Out, Pro HD 2500, Hydro 1500, and Armor 3500.
Illustrate the proper application methods for different tire types.
Discuss the benefits of using Multi-Seal, such as preventing flats and maintaining proper air pressure.
